alert.note: Alert for Kaiser to Rodgers Ridge; Kings Canyon NP (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:38PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Fresno County through 415 PM PDT... At 338 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southwest of Big Pine Creek Campground, or 12 miles south of South Lake, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Le Conte Canyon Ranger Station, Bishop Pass, State Lakes, McClure Meadow Ranger Station and Simpson Meadow Patrol Cabin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
